a house or vehicle of one color is as good as one of another color.
3.  Many atheists try to refute belief in God with the following reductio ad
absurdum argument: God is defined to be all-good and all-powerful (as
well as all-knowing). If God is all-good, then God prevents as much evil
as He can. If God is all-powerful (and all-knowing), then God can prev
